$Log: eur.ba_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.2 2010-06-19 19:41:58 gcrane accent errors fixed
Revision 1.1 2009/11/23 18:46:35 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 21:15:27 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:33:30 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.10 2004/04/21 20:27:26 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.9 2003/11/06 15:09:08 amahoney curiously, closing editorial angle bracket was coded as a parenthesis
Revision 1.8 2003/09/09 18:02:08 amahoney put spaces around em-dash entity so as not to confuse morphology stuff
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:16:09 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:34:32 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/17 15:51:39 amahoney use n attribute on sp to carry over speaker names when long speeches are interrupted by card breaks -- and move card break past close tag of sp
Revision 1.4 1999/12/23 20:06:51 amahoney convert to P3

sw=ma kai\ qarsei=te sarko\s e)camei/yasai tro/mon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= fa/os me/giston h(mi=n eu)i/ou bakxeu/matos,
w(s e)sei=don a)sme/nh se, mona/d' e)/xous' e)rhmi/an.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s ga\r ou)/; ti/s moi fu/lac h)=n, ei) su\ sumfora=s tu/xois;
a)lla\ pw=s h)leuqerw/qhs a)ndro\s a)nosi/ou tuxw/n;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: au)to\s e)ce/sw|s' e)mauto\n r(a|di/ws a)/neu po/nou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)de/ sou sunh=ye xei=re desmi/oisin e)n bro/xois;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: tau=ta kai\ kaqu/bris' au)to/n, o(/ti me desmeu/ein dokw=n
ou)/t' e)/qigen ou)/q' h(/yaq' h(mw=n, e)lpi/sin d' e)bo/sketo.
pro\s fa/tnais de\ tau=ron eu(rw/n, ou(= kaqei=rc' h(ma=s a)/gwn,
tw=|de peri\ bro/xous e)/balle go/nasi kai\ xhlai=s podw=n,
qumo\n e)kpne/wn, i(drw=ta sw/matos sta/zwn a)/po,
xei/lesin didou\s o)do/ntas: plhsi/on d' e)gw\ parw\n
h(/suxos qa/sswn e)/leusson. e)n de\ tw=|de tw=| xro/nw|
a)neti/nac' e)lqw\n o( *ba/kxos dw=ma kai\ mhtro\s ta/fw|
pu=r a)nh=y': o(\ d' w(s e)sei=de, dw/mat' ai)/qesqai dokw=n,
h)=|ss' e)kei=se ka)=|t' e)kei=se, dmwsi\n *)axelw=|on fe/rein
e)nne/pwn, a(/pas d' e)n e)/rgw| dou=los h)=n, ma/thn ponw=n.
diameqei\s de\ to/nde mo/xqon, w(s e)mou= pefeugo/tos,
i(/etai ci/fos kelaino\n a(rpa/sas do/mwn e)/sw.
ka)=|q' o( *bro/mios, w(s e)/moige fai/netai, do/can le/gw,
fa/sm' e)poi/hsen kat' au)lh/n: o(\ d' e)pi\ tou=q' w(rmhme/nos
h)=|sse ka)ke/ntei faenno\n <ai)qe/r'>, w(s sfa/zwn e)me/.
pro\s de\ toi=sd' au)tw=| ta/d' a)/lla *ba/kxios lumai/netai:
dw/mat' e)/rrhcen xama=ze: sunteqra/nwtai d' a(/pan
pikrota/tous i)do/nti desmou\s tou\s e)mou/s: ko/pou d' u(/po
diameqei\s ci/fos parei=tai: pro\s qeo\n ga\r w)\n a)nh\r
e)s ma/xhn e)lqei=n e)to/lmhse. h(/suxos d' e)kba\s e)gw\
dwma/twn h(/kw pro\s u(ma=s, *penqe/ws ou) fronti/sas.
w(s de/ moi dokei= — yofei= gou=n a)rbu/lh do/mwn e)/sw —
e)s pronw/pi' au)ti/x' h(/cei. ti/ pot' a)/r' e)k tou/twn e)rei=;
r(a|di/ws ga\r au)to\n oi)/sw, ka)\n pne/wn e)/lqh| me/ga.
pro\s sofou= ga\r a)ndro\s a)skei=n sw/fron' eu)orghsi/an.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: pe/ponqa deina/: diape/feuge/ m' o( ce/nos,
o(/d' e)sti\n a(nh/r: ti/ ta/de; pw=s pronw/pios
fai/nh| pro\s oi)/kois toi=s e)moi=s, e)/cw bebw/s;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: sth=son po/d', o)rgh=| d' u(po/qes h(/suxon po/da.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: po/qen su\ desma\ diafugw\n e)/cw pera=|s;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ou)k ei)=pon--h)\ ou)k h)/kousas--o(/ti lu/sei me/ tis;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: ti/s; tou\s lo/gous ga\r e)sfe/reis kainou\s a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: o(\s th\n polu/botrun a)/mpelon fu/ei brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: klh/|ein keleu/w pa/nta pu/rgon e)n ku/klw|.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ti/ d'; ou)x u(perbai/nousi kai\ tei/xh qeoi/;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: sofo\s sofo\s su/, plh\n a(\ dei= s' ei)=nai sofo/n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: a(\ dei= ma/lista, tau=t' e)/gwg' e)/fun sofo/s.
kei/nou d' a)kou/sas prw=ta tou\s lo/gous ma/qe,
o(\s e)c o)/rous pa/restin a)ggelw=n ti/ soi:
h(mei=s de/ soi menou=men, ou) feucou/meqa.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: h(/keis de\ poi/an prostiqei\s spoudh\n lo/gou;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: ba/kxas potnia/das ei)sidw/n, ai(\ th=sde gh=s
h(/kw fra/sai soi\ kai\ po/lei xrh/|zwn, a)/nac,
w(s deina\ drw=si qauma/twn te krei/ssona.
qe/lw d' a)kou=sai, po/tera/ soi parrhsi/a|
fra/sw ta\ kei=qen h)\ lo/gon steilw/meqa:
to\ ga\r ta/xos sou tw=n frenw=n de/doik', a)/nac,
kai\ tou)cu/qumon kai\ to\ basiliko\n li/an.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: le/g', w(s a)qw=|os e)c e)mou= pa/ntws e)/sh|.
toi=s ga\r dikai/ois ou)xi\ qumou=sqai xrew/n.
o(/sw| d' a)\n ei)/ph|s deino/tera bakxw=n pe/ri,
tosw=|de ma=llon to\n u(poqe/nta ta\s te/xnas

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: a)gelai=a me\n boskh/mat' a)/rti pro\s le/pas
o(rw= de\ qia/sous trei=s gunaikei/wn xorw=n,
w(=n h)=rx' e(no\s me\n *au)tono/h, tou= deute/rou
ai(\ me\n pro\s e)la/ths nw=t' e)rei/sasai fo/bhn,
ai(\ d' e)n druo\s fu/lloisi pro\s pe/dw| ka/ra
ei)kh=| balou=sai swfro/nws, ou)x w(s su\ fh\|s
h( sh\ de\ mh/thr w)lo/lucen e)n me/sais
staqei=sa ba/kxais, e)c u(/pnou kinei=n de/mas,
ai(\ d' a)pobalou=sai qalero\n o)mma/twn u(/pnon
ne/ai palaiai\ parqe/noi t' e)/t' a)/zuges.
kai\ prw=ta me\n kaqei=san ei)s w)/mous ko/mas
ai(\ d' a)gka/laisi dorka/d' h)\ sku/mnous lu/kwn
o(/sais neoto/kois masto\s h)=n spargw=n e)/ti
bre/fh lipou/sais: e)pi\ d' e)/qento kissi/nous
stefa/nous druo/s te mi/lako/s t' a)nqesfo/rou.
qu/rson de/ tis labou=s' e)/paisen e)s pe/tran,
a)/llh de\ na/rqhk' e)s pe/don kaqh=ke gh=s,
kai\ th=|de krh/nhn e)canh=k' oi)/nou qeo/s:
o(/sais de\ leukou= pw/matos po/qos parh=n,
ga/laktos e(smou\s ei)=xon: e)k de\ kissi/nwn

w(/st', ei) parh=sqa, to
 qeo
 to
 nu=n ye/geis
w(s deina\ drw=si qauma/twn t' e)pa/cia:
kai/ tis pla/nhs kat' a)/stu kai\ tri/bwn lo/gwn
xa/rin t' a)/nakti qw/meqa; eu)= d' h(mi=n le/gein
kru/yantes au(tou/s: ai(\ de\ th\n tetagme/nhn
kai\ qh=res, ou)de\n d' h)=n a)ki/nhton dro/mw|.
h(\ d' a)nebo/hsen: *)=w droma/des e)mai\ ku/nes,
qhrw/meq' a)ndrw=n tw=nd' u(/p': a)ll' e(/pesqe/ moi,
bakxw=n sparagmo/n, ai(\ de\ nemome/nais xlo/hn

kai\ th
 me
 a)
 prosei=des eu)/qhlon po/rin
ei)=des d' a)\n h)\ pleu/r' h)\ di/xhlon e)/mbasin
r(ipto/men' a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw: kremasta\ de\
tau=roi d' u(bristai\ ka)s ke/ras qumou/menoi
to\ pro/sqen e)sfa/llonto pro\s gai=an de/mas,
h)\ se\ cuna/yai ble/fara basilei/ois ko/rais.
xwrou=si d' w(/st' o)/rniqes a)rqei=sai dro/mw|
e)pespesou=sai pa/nt' a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw
die/feron: h(/rpazon me\n e)k do/mwn te/kna:
o(po/sa d' e)p' w)/mois e)/qesan, ou) desmw=n u(/po
prosei/xet' ou)d' e)/pipten e)s me/lan pe/don,
ou) xalko/s, ou) si/dhros: e)pi\ de\ bostru/xois
pu=r e)/feron, ou)d' e)/kaien. oi(\ d' o)rgh=s u(/po
e)s o(/pl' e)xw/roun fero/menoi bakxw=n u(/po:
ou(=per to\ deino\n h)=n qe/am' i)dei=n, a)/nac.
toi=s me\n ga\r ou)x h(/|masse logxwto\n be/los,
gunai=kes a)/ndras, ou)k a)/neu qew=n tinos.
pa/lin d' e)xw/roun o(/qen e)ki/nhsan po/da,
krh/nas e)p' au)ta\s a(\s a)nh=k' au)tai=s qeo/s.
ni/yanto d' ai(=ma, stago/na d' e)k parhi/dwn
to\n dai/mon' ou)=n to/nd' o(/stis e)/st', w)= de/spota,
de/xou po/lei th=|d': w(s ta/ t' a)/ll' e)sti\n me/gas,
ka)kei=no/ fasin au)to/n, w(s e)gw\ klu/w,
oi)/nou de\ mhke/t' o)/ntos ou)k e)/stin *ku/pris
ou)d' a)/llo terpno\n ou)de\n a)nqrw/pois e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tarbw= me\n ei)pei=n tou\s lo/gous e)leuqe/rous
pro\s to\n tu/rannon, a)ll' o(/mws ei)rh/setai:

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: h)/dh to/d' e)ggu\s w(/ste pu=r u(fa/ptetai
a)ll' ou)k o)knei=n dei=: stei=x' e)p' *)hle/ktras i)w\n
pe/ltas q' o(/soi pa/llousi kai\ to/cwn xeri\
ba/kxaisin: ou) ga\r a)ll' u(perba/llei ta/de,
ei) pro\s gunaikw=n peiso/mesq' a(\ pa/sxomen.

sp.l: pei/qh| me\n ou)de/n, tw=n e)mw=n lo/gwn klu/wn,
*penqeu=: kakw=s de\ pro\s se/qen pa/sxwn o(/mws
ou)/ fhmi xrh=nai/ s' o(/pl' e)pai/resqai qew=|,

sp.l: ou) mh\ frenw/seis m', a)lla\ de/smios fugw\n

sp.l: qu/oim' a)\n au)tw=| ma=llon h)\ qumou/menos

sp.l: qu/sw, fo/non ge qh=lun, w(/sper a)/ciai,

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: feu/cesqe pa/ntes: kai\ to/d' ai)sxro/n, a)spi/das

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: e)gw\ gunai=kas deu=r' o(/plwn a)/cw di/xa.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: oi)/moi: to/d' h)/dh do/lion e)/s me mhxana=|.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: poi=o/n ti, sw=|sai/ s' ei) qe/lw te/xnais e)mai=s;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: cune/qesqe koinh=| ta/d', i(/na bakxeu/ht' a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: kai\ mh\n cuneqe/mhn--tou=to/ g' e)/sti--tw=| qew=|.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: e)kfe/rete/ moi deu=r' o(/pla, su\ de\ pau=sai le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: bou/lh| sf' e)n o)/resi sugkaqhme/nas i)dei=n;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: ma/lista, muri/on ge dou\s xrusou= staqmo/n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: ti/ d' ei)s e)/rwta tou=de pe/ptwkas me/gan;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: o(/mws d' i)/dois a)\n h(de/ws a(/ soi pikra/;

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: a)ll' e)cixneu/sousi/n se, ka)\n e)/lqh|s la/qra|.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)mfanw=s: kalw=s ga\r e)cei=pas ta/de.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: a)/g' w(s ta/xista, tou= xro/nou de/ soi fqonw=.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: stei=lai/ nun a)mfi\ xrwti\ bussi/nous pe/plous.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.l: mh/ se kta/nwsin, h)\n a)nh\r o)fqh=|s e)kei=.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: eu)= g' ei)=pas au)= to/d': w(/s tis ei)= pa/lai sofo/s.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.l: h(/cei de\ ba/kxas, ou(= qanw\n dw/sei di/khn.

teisw/meq' au)to/n. prw=ta d' e)/ksthson frenw=n,

ou) mh\ qelh/sh| qh=lun e)ndu=nai stolh/n,
e)/cw d' e)lau/nwn tou= fronei=n e)ndu/setai.
e)k tw=n a)peilw=n tw=n pri/n, ai(=si deino\s h)=n.
a)ll' ei)=mi ko/smon o(/nper ei)s *(/aidou labw\n

sp.l: ti/ to\ sofo/n; h)\ ti/ to\ ka/llion

o(/ ti pot' a)/ra to\ daimo/nion,
to/ t' e)n xro/nw| makrw=| no/mimon
ti/ to\ sofo/n; h)\ ti/ to\ ka/llion

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: ti/ fai/nomai dh=t'; ou)xi\ th\n *)inou=s sta/sin

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s

sp.l: mh\ su/ ge ta\ *numfw=n diole/sh|s i(dru/mata

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n dokw= sfa=s e)n lo/xmais o)/rniqas w(\s

lh/yh| d' i)/sws sfa=s, h)\n su\ mh\ lhfqh=|s pa/ros.

sp.speaker: *penqeu/s
